00036 #if defined(_MSC_VER)

00040 #include "btkLowToHighImageResolutionMethod.h"
00041 #include "btkResampleImageByInjectionFilter.h"
00042 
00043 #include "btkSliceBySliceTransform.h"
00044 #include "itkEuler3DTransform.h"
00045 #include "itkTransformFileReader.h"
00046 
00047 #include "itkImage.h"
00048 #include <tclap/CmdLine.h>
00049 
00050 #include "itkImageMaskSpatialObject.h"
00051 #include "btkImageIntersectionCalculator.h"
00052 
00053 #include "itkImageFileReader.h"
00054 #include "itkImageFileWriter.h"
00055 
00056 #include <stdio.h>
00057 
00058 int main( int argc, char *argv[] )
00059 {
00060 
00061   try {
00062 
00063   std::vector< std::string > input;
00064   std::vector< std::string > mask;
00065   std::vector< std::string > transform;
00066   std::vector< std::string > roi;
00067 
00068   double margin;
00069 
00070   const char *outImage = NULL;
00071 
00072   // Parse arguments
00073 
00074   TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("Creates a high resolution image from a set of low resolution images", ' ', "Unversioned");
00075 
00076   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> inputArg("i","input","Image file",true,"string",cmd);
00077   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> maskArg("m","","Mask file",false,"string",cmd);
00078   TCLAP::MultiArg<std::string> transformArg("t","transform","Transform input file",true,"string",cmd);
00079   TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> outArg("o","output","High resolution image",true,"","string",cmd);
00080 
00081   TCLAP::ValueArg<double> marginArg("","margin","Adds a margin to the reconstructed images"
00082   "to compensate for a small FOV in the reference. The value must be provided in millimeters."
00083   " (default 0)",false, 0.0,"double",cmd);
00084 
00085   TCLAP::SwitchArg  boxSwitchArg("","box","Use intersections for roi calculation",false);
00086   TCLAP::SwitchArg  maskSwitchArg("","mask","Use masks for roi calculation",false);
00087   TCLAP::SwitchArg  allSwitchArg("","all","Use the whole image FOV",false);
00088 
00089   // xor arguments for roi assessment
00090 
00091   std::vector<TCLAP::Arg*>  xorlist;
00092   xorlist.push_back(&boxSwitchArg);
00093   xorlist.push_back(&maskSwitchArg);
00094   xorlist.push_back(&allSwitchArg);
00095 
00096   cmd.xorAdd( xorlist );
00097 
00098   // Parse the argv array.
00099   cmd.parse( argc, argv );
00100 
00101   input = inputArg.getValue();
00102   mask = maskArg.getValue();
00103   outImage = outArg.getValue().c_str();
00104   transform = transformArg.getValue();
00105   margin = marginArg.getValue();
00106 
00107   // typedefs
00108 
00109   const    unsigned int    Dimension = 3;
00110   typedef  short           PixelType;
00111 
00112   typedef itk::Image< PixelType, Dimension >  ImageType;
00113   typedef ImageType::Pointer                  ImagePointer;
00114 
00115   typedef ImageType::RegionType               RegionType;
00116   typedef std::vector< RegionType >           RegionArrayType;
00117 
00118   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageType  >  ImageReaderType;
00119 
00120   typedef itk::Image< unsigned char, Dimension >    ImageMaskType;
00121   typedef ImageMaskType::Pointer                    ImageMaskPointer;
00122 
00123   typedef itk::ImageFileReader< ImageMaskType >     MaskReaderType;
00124   typedef itk::ImageMaskSpatialObject< Dimension >  MaskType;
00125   typedef MaskType::Pointer  MaskPointer;
00126 
00127   typedef btk::LowToHighImageResolutionMethod<ImageType> LowToHighResFilterType;
00128   LowToHighResFilterType::Pointer lowToHighResFilter = LowToHighResFilterType::New();
00129 
00130   typedef btk::ResampleImageByInjectionFilter< ImageType, ImageType >  ResamplerType;
00131 
00132   typedef btk::SliceBySliceTransform< double, Dimension > TransformType;
00133   typedef TransformType::Pointer                          TransformPointer;
00134 
00135   typedef btk::Euler3DTransform< double > Euler3DTransformType;
00136   typedef Euler3DTransformType::Pointer   Euler3DTransformPointer;
00137 
00138   typedef itk::TransformFileReader     TransformReaderType;
00139   typedef TransformReaderType::TransformListType * TransformListType;
00140 
00141   typedef btk::ImageIntersectionCalculator<ImageType> IntersectionCalculatorType;
00142   IntersectionCalculatorType::Pointer intersectionCalculator = IntersectionCalculatorType::New();
00143 
00144   // Filter setup
00145   unsigned int numberOfImages = input.size();
00146   std::vector< ImagePointer >             images(numberOfImages);
00147   std::vector< ImageMaskPointer >         imageMasks(numberOfImages);
00148   std::vector< TransformPointer >         transforms(numberOfImages);
00149   std::vector< Euler3DTransformPointer >  euler3DTransforms(numberOfImages);
00150   std::vector< MaskPointer >              masks(numberOfImages);
00151   std::vector< RegionType >               rois(numberOfImages);
00152 
00153   ImagePointer refImage;
00154   ImagePointer recImage;
00155 
00156   // Create reference image
00157 
00158   lowToHighResFilter -> SetNumberOfImages(numberOfImages);
00159   lowToHighResFilter -> SetTargetImage( 0 );
00160   lowToHighResFilter -> SetMargin( margin );
00161 
00162   for (unsigned int i=0; i<numberOfImages; i++)
00163   {
00164     // Read and set image
00165 
00166     ImageReaderType::Pointer imageReader = ImageReaderType::New();
00167     imageReader -> SetFileName( input[i].c_str() );
00168     imageReader -> Update();
00169     images[i] = imageReader -> GetOutput();
00170 
00171     lowToHighResFilter -> SetImageArray(i, images[i] );
00172 
00173     if ( boxSwitchArg.isSet() )
00174     {
00175       intersectionCalculator -> AddImage( images[i] );
00176     }
00177 
00178   }
00179 
00180   if ( boxSwitchArg.isSet() )
00181   {
00182     intersectionCalculator -> Compute();
00183   }
00184 
00185   // Set roi according to the provided arguments
00186 
00187   for (unsigned int i=0; i<numberOfImages; i++)
00188   {
00189 
00190     if ( maskSwitchArg.isSet() )
00191     {
00192       MaskReaderType::Pointer maskReader = MaskReaderType::New();
00193       maskReader -> SetFileName( mask[i].c_str() );
00194       maskReader -> Update();
00195       imageMasks[i] = maskReader -> GetOutput();
00196       lowToHighResFilter -> SetImageMaskArray( i, imageMasks[i] );
00197 
00198       masks[i] = MaskType::New();
00199       masks[i] -> SetImage( imageMasks[i] );
00200       rois[i] = masks[i] -> GetAxisAlignedBoundingBoxRegion();
00201 
00202       lowToHighResFilter -> SetRegionArray( i, rois[i] );
00203 
00204     } else if ( boxSwitchArg.isSet() )
00205       {
00206         imageMasks[i] = intersectionCalculator -> GetImageMask(i);
00207         lowToHighResFilter -> SetImageMaskArray( i, imageMasks[i] );
00208 
00209         masks[i] = MaskType::New();
00210         masks[i] -> SetImage( imageMasks[i] );
00211         rois[i] = masks[i] -> GetAxisAlignedBoundingBoxRegion();
00212         lowToHighResFilter -> SetRegionArray( i, rois[i] );
00213 
00214       } else if ( allSwitchArg.isSet() )
00215         {
00216           rois[i] = images[i] -> GetLargestPossibleRegion();
00217 
00218           lowToHighResFilter -> SetRegionArray( i, rois[i] );
00219         }
00220   }
00221 
00222   std::cout << "Creating isotropic image ... ";
00223 
00224   // Start registration
00225   try
00226     {
00227     lowToHighResFilter->StartRegistration();
00228     }
00229   catch( itk::ExceptionObject & err )
00230     {
00231     std::cerr << "ExceptionObject caught !" << std::endl;
00232     std::cerr << err << std::endl;
00233     return EXIT_FAILURE;
00234     }
00235 
00236   std::cout << "done. " << std::endl;
00237 
00238   lowToHighResFilter -> Initialize();
00239   refImage = lowToHighResFilter->GetHighResolutionImage();
00240 
00241   // Read transforms
00242   itk::TransformFactory<TransformType>::RegisterTransform();
00243   itk::TransformFactory<Euler3DTransformType>::RegisterTransform();
00244 
00245   for (unsigned int i=0; i<numberOfImages; i++)
00246   {
00247     if (transform.size() > 0)
00248     {
00249       TransformReaderType::Pointer transformReader = TransformReaderType::New();
00250       transformReader -> SetFileName( transform[i] );
00251       transformReader -> Update();
00252 
00253       TransformListType transformList = transformReader->GetTransformList();
00254       TransformReaderType::TransformListType::const_iterator titr = transformList->begin();
00255 
00256       const char * className = titr -> GetPointer() -> GetNameOfClass();
00257 
00258       if (strcmp(className,"Euler3DTransform") == 0)
00259       {
00260         euler3DTransforms[i] = dynamic_cast< Euler3DTransformType * >( titr->GetPointer() );
00261 
00262         transforms[i] = TransformType::New();
00263         transforms[i] -> SetImage( images[i] );
00264         transforms[i] -> Initialize( euler3DTransforms[i] );
00265       } else if (strcmp(className,"SliceBySliceTransform") == 0)
00266         {
00267           transforms[i] = dynamic_cast< TransformType * >( titr->GetPointer() );
00268           transforms[i] -> SetImage( images[i]);
00269         } else
00270           {
00271             std::cout << className << " is not a valid transform. Exiting ..."
00272                 << std::endl;
00273             return EXIT_FAILURE;
00274           }
00275     }
00276   }
00277 
00278   // Inject images
00279 
00280   std::cout << "Injecting images ... "; std::cout.flush();
00281 
00282   ResamplerType::Pointer resampler = ResamplerType::New();
00283 
00284   for (unsigned int i=0; i<numberOfImages; i++)
00285   {
00286     resampler -> AddInput( images[i] );
00287     resampler -> AddRegion( rois[i] );
00288     resampler -> SetTransform(i, transforms[i] ) ;
00289   }
00290 
00291   resampler -> UseReferenceImageOn();
00292   resampler -> SetReferenceImage( refImage );
00293   resampler -> SetImageMask(lowToHighResFilter -> GetImageMaskCombination());
00294   resampler -> Update();
00295 
00296   std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00297 
00298   recImage = resampler -> GetOutput() ;
00299 
00300 
00301   // Write HR image
00302 
00303   typedef itk::ImageFileWriter< ImageType >  WriterType;
00304 
00305   WriterType::Pointer writer =  WriterType::New();
00306   writer-> SetFileName( outImage );
00307   writer-> SetInput( recImage );
00308 
00309   std::cout << "Writing " << outImage << " ... ";
00310   writer-> Update();
00311   std::cout << "done." << std::endl;
00312 
00313   return EXIT_SUCCESS;
00314 
00315   } catch (TCLAP::ArgException &e)  // catch any exceptions
00316   { std::cerr << "error: " << e.error() << " for arg " << e.argId() << std::endl; }
00317 }
